last_episode_to_air.name: Yee Haw!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kevin Abstract prepares for his final show at the Roxy in West Hollywood. Post tour, Brockhampton searches for a new house, and shoots a music video for Miserable America.

name: American Boyband
overview: Kevin Abstract wants to be a pop star. Along with his self-proclaimed boy band “Brockhampton” he is on a mission to translate his faithful online following into real world success.

episodes.name: The Makings of a Popstar
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract prepares to embark on his first headlining tour across the U.S. and Canada alongside members of his music collective “Brockhampton.”

episodes.name: Meetings Suck
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract deals with the stress of headlining his first tour while trying to shoot his short film, Helmet Boy. Back in LA, the rest of the crew continues to make music.

episodes.name: Good TV
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract and his DJ, Romil, struggle with technical issues that come to a head in Atlanta. Back in LA, Ameer Vann prepares to join the tour after losing his job.

episodes.name: Broken Bones
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract and Brockhampton rapper, Ameer Vann, visit their hometown in Texas, reflecting on growing up in a white suburb. Ameer performs in front of his hometown.

episodes.name: Origins of a Boyband
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract and his crew visit San Marcos, Texas where the group formed, and discuss the growing pains of success. Later in Dallas, drama brews between fans in the twitter-sphere.

episodes.name: Not Yet
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract and team try to shoot Helmet Boy despite exhaustion from tour life. A small turn out for their Denver show inspires them to drive through the night back to LA.

episodes.name: The Brockhampton Factory
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract and Creative Director, HK, scramble to finish their short film, Helmet Boy for a meeting with Spike Jonze. Kevin directs a music video for Brockhampton's new song.

episodes.name: Yee Haw!
episodes.overview: Kevin Abstract prepares for his final show at the Roxy in West Hollywood. Post tour, Brockhampton searches for a new house, and shoots a music video for Miserable America.
